name: redux-data-collections
description: Redux actions, reducers and selectors for managing data in JSONAPI format.

scripts.check:examples: yarn build:examples && yarn lint:examples && yarn test:examples
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/redux-data-collections.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/redux-data-collections.min.js
scripts.build: yarn build:commonjs && yarn build:es && yarn build:umd && yarn build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: yarn clean && yarn check:src && yarn build
scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag $PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.docs:build: yarn docs:prepare && gitbook build -g heygrady/redux-data-collections && cp logo/apple-touch-icon.png _book/gitbook/images/apple-touch-icon-precomposed-152.png && cp logo/favicon.ico _book/gitbook/images
scripts.docs:publish: yarn docs:clean && yarn docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:heygrady/redux-data-collections gh-pages --force

author: Grady Kuhnline <github@heygrady.net> (https://github.com/heygrady)
